name: Pip Central
description:
Pip Central is a single player puzzle game built with Unity for the 2022 GMTK 48h GameJam.

Controls

Use WASD to move the dice.  Press SPACE to charge the laser, pressing WASD will shoot it in the given direction. To reset the dice, press R.

Goal

Reach the end of each maze controlling the blue dice. The end of each maze is marked by a taller blue gate with red dots. Your way will be blocked by gates, marked with either blue or red pips (dots). The blue gates open when the corresponding  pips on your dice face up. 

The red gates open by shooting them with the red laser, aiming the corresponding pips towards the gate.
